More Notes: An SD increase in Tx5d intensity depresses growth by 0.63 percentage points. Assuming this effect is estimated for 2013, the end of the data range.
An SD increase in Tx5d intensity enhances growth by 0.62 p.p. Assuming this effect is estimated for 2013, the end of the data range.
Negative effect of temperature variability on growth when including Tx5d.
Negative effect of temperature variability on growth when Tx5d is removed from the model. Shows that extreme heat can inflate temperature variability effect by 10%.
Global average increase in regional Tx5d values due to anthropogenic warming. Averaged over 1992-2013, so using last year of period.
Average increase in the probability of extreme Tx5d values across regions due to anthropogenic warming. Averaged over 1992-2013, so using last year of period.
Change in growth due to anthropogenic changes in Tx5d; diff observed & counterfactual
